name: enterprise-graphql-sever
author: Nolin D Naidoo <nolinnaidoo77@gmail.com> (https://www.linkedin.com/in/nolindnaidoo/)
description: An flexible enterprise-class GraphQL server template built using Node, Express, Express-GraphQL, and GraphQL.

scripts.build: yarn run pre && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node --experimental-specifier-resolution=node server/server.js
scripts.buildci: yarn run pre && cross-env NODE_ENV=ci node --experimental-specifier-resolution=node server/server.js
scripts.start: yarn run pre && cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon --experimental-specifier-resolution=node server/server.js
